Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Ref, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Date, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Number, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Posted, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Entity AS EntityForFiltering, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.TransactionType, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.PettyCash, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Article, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Counterparty, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.AdvanceHolder, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.AmountReceipt, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.AmountExpense, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Currency, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Comment, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Type, ENDOFPERIOD(DocumentJournalCashDocuments.Date, Day) AS DateDay, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.CashRegister, DocumentJournalCashDocuments.BaseUnit FROM DocumentJournal.CashDocuments AS DocumentJournalCashDocuments
